mainSequence.step: Me executes the Remove Book From Catalog Activity.
The Remove Book From Catalog Activity triggers the removal of the book from the catalog.
The catalog manages the source system operation for book removal.
If the book is found, the Remove Book From Catalog Result is returned to the request.
If the book is not found, a BookNotFoundException is triggered and handled by the request function.
The Remove Book From Catalog Response is sent back to Me in case of successful book removal.
